subtitle: Advanced VR Sideloading Protocol
err_no_device: No device detected. Please connect your VR headset via USB and ensure ADB is enabled.
obb_no_device_msg: Select a device to view OBB folders
auth_help_desc: Device detected but unauthorized. Please check your VR headset and click 'Allow' on the dialog. Check 'Always allow...' to skip this next time.
auth_help_success_desc: Your Quest device is now connected and ready to use.
setup_desc: Before we start, please select a folder where temporary files will be extracted during installation.
setup_folder_hint: This folder will be used to temporarily store extracted files during installation.
setup_folder_auto_create: The app will automatically create a 'HyperTopiaExtraction' subfolder in your selected location to store temporary files.
settings_desc: Manage your extraction folder and view storage information.
settings_info: Changing the folder will clean up old temporary files and move to the new location.
apps_no_device: Select a device to view apps
apps_confirm_uninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall this app?
login_description: Enter the email address you used to purchase
login_info: Only registered users can access game downloads
email_login_hint: Enter the email you used to purchase
google_login_failed: Google login failed. Try email login instead.
deep_link_failed: Browser cannot open app. Try popup or email login.
device_code_instruction: Go to website and enter this code:
tutorial_install_game_desc: Complete guide for VR game installation.
tutorial_install_game_step1: 1. Ensure Meta Quest is connected and detected.
tutorial_install_game_step2: 2. Download the game from the HyperTopia website.
tutorial_install_game_step3: 3. The download will be a ZIP/RAR file, do not extract it.
tutorial_install_game_step4: 4. Drag-and-drop the file to the sidebar area, or click 'Browse File'.
tutorial_install_game_step5_apk_obb: Case 1: Detected APK file and OBB folder (Image 2).
tutorial_install_game_step5_apk_only: Case 2: Detected only APK file without OBB folder (Image 1).
tutorial_install_game_step6: 6. Click the enabled Install button. 'Install APK' if only APK exists, or 'Install Full' if both exist.
tutorial_install_game_note: OBB folders are optional. The system will detect them automatically, so don't worry if a game doesn't have one.
tutorial_install_game_warning: Please do not extract the downloaded game file, directly select/import the raw ZIP/RAR file.
tutorial_uninstall_app_desc: Easy way to remove installed apps from your headset.
tutorial_uninstall_app_step2: 2. Find the app you want to remove.
tutorial_uninstall_app_step4: 4. Confirm the action in the dialog.
tutorial_connect_device_desc: First steps to connect your Meta Quest to the installer.
tutorial_connect_device_step1: 1. Ensure Meta Quest Developer Mode is enabled via Meta Horizon App as shown below.
tutorial_connect_device_step1_note: If it still looks like the image below, please view the provided tutorial:
tutorial_connect_device_step2: 2. Connect the Meta Quest VR using a USB-C cable.
tutorial_connect_device_step3: 3. Allow 'USB Debugging' inside the Meta Quest, check 'Always allow from this computer' as shown below.
tutorial_connect_device_step4: 4. The HyperTopia Installer app will automatically detect your connected Meta Quest.
tutorial_link_dev_mode: Tutorial: How to Enable Developer Mode
tutorials_subtitle: Guides and help for using the installer
drag_drop_full: Drop Game File or Folder Here
no_device_warning_desc: Please connect your Meta Quest device first to install games.
connect_device_first_desc: Please connect your Meta Quest to continue
troubleshoot_cable: Make sure USB-C cable supports data transfer (not charging only)
troubleshoot_dev_mode: Enable Developer Mode on Meta Quest via Meta Horizon App
troubleshoot_usb_debug: Allow USB Debugging inside Quest when prompted
troubleshoot_restart: Try unplugging and reconnecting USB cable, or restart the app
webview_info_notice: For login, download, and purchases, please open in external browser. This webview is for browsing catalog only.
tutorials_info_desc: Please read and follow the guides provided here. If any step is still confusing after reading, then contact admin for help.
obb_info_desc: OBB Manager displays the list of OBB folders (additional game data) installed on your Quest device. Use this feature to see which games have OBB files.
apps_info_desc: Apps Manager displays third-party applications installed on your Quest. Be careful when uninstalling apps as game data will be lost and cannot be recovered.
device_preference_desc: Filter games compatible with your Quest model
